title: Untitled (for now) 6 or Things I Used to Need
medium: Audio and acrylic on and with found objects
description: The painting components in this series of works are mostly connected to objects related to former needs. This work attempts to relate a painting of baby formula measuring cups along a delicate line of comprehension – a line like the remaining one connecting us to things we used to need – things that we have almost forgotten. Audience members can put their heads inside to hear the audio.
